title: The Dan Bongino Sunday Special 12/12/21
description:
First up today is an interview with beloved children’s book author Matt Walsh. We talk about his best selling children’s book “Johnny the Walrus,” and also about the news of the day. Then Texas representative Chip Roy joined us to talk about what he’s doing in congress to stand up against these terrible vaccine mandates, and we also discussed the ridiculous push to draft women into the military. Finally, we talked with Steve Deace from the Steve Deace show and Blaze media. He’s an expert on everything going on right now with Covid, vaccines and mandates and we talked about the latest news on all these topics.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
